entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:07 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
